text: @realDonaldTrump EXHAUSTION? Why don’t do something not so EXHAUSTING and LIFT THE TRAVEL BAN TO THE US FOR UK CITIZENS!!!! They can give some advice on how to get control of Covid-19 ! Something you obviously don’t have a clue of how to do !
